lines.text: 17. Yeah, you actually hopscotch up, leap over Percy and get up on top next to her over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Percy! Didn't notice your bald spot there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just grows in lighter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, it's going to use its third legendary action this turn to attempt a tail attack against you,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Vix.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will stab you. That is a 19 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the impact of some large, heavy slam onto the stone right next to you. Pieces of it break off, and then withdraws, barely dodging it in time. All right, that ends--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Since he made an attack, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Reveal himself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the word?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Reveal! Appear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Appear. There you go! Oh, that's cocked. All right. That is a19 plus 11. I'm pretty sure it makes the save.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I still get a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been during your turn. You can only hold your action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (snarls frustratedly)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good try. Brings us to the top. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god! Okay, I'm going to take a second to try and pray that my second gun doesn't break because that's going to get really ugly! And it doesn't! My gun is fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My gun is fine. But that's it. I'm going to start running straight down, as far as my legs will take me. Not that way, towards the pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the pool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there. Oh no, that's the insects, that's right. So, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as you get out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to roll around to the stone to the right, then. As far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there. You're outside of the insect cloud, not a worry. As you're running, you're cleaning it, polishing, loading it. Okay, looks good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes. I'm going to spend my bonus action to do a quick heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, your Second Wind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My Second Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, yeah. Good. You can move on, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have any kind of sense of-- Ugh, your Stinking Cloud is right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You do see some elements of the cloud are displaced in places. It's not showing you exactly where it is, but you are aware that the entity of Umbrasyl is directly in front of Shale, and nearly directly in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Enough to negate the disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not to mention the fact that you are technically in its melee range. So any of your ranged attacks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are at disadvantage again, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless it's five foot. Is it five foot, or is it melee? Trying to remember. I think it's five feet. But regardless, it's close to you, it's bad news.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Trinket gets up, does that use any of my stuff? Trinket can move freely--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket can move independently of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Trinket is going to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half-movement, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's going to bite Umbrasyl's tail to try to distract him, so I can run between his legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Trinket's going to go ahead and-- roll a perception check for Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket, snack attack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's got a keen sense of smell, so he's got advantage on smell perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again. We'll see if Trinket can discern between--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I rolled a 15. And I don't know what I add to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be Trinket's wisdom--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --oh, perception, seven. So 22

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Okay. Trinket (bear sniffs and growl) runs past here, but can only make 20 feet of its movement because he used the rest to get out of prone. However, strafes aside and begins reaching out and starts snapping, so you want to give Trinket--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As part of your attack action? Is that what you're doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to have Trinket do one of his attacks so I can move and run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have Trinket roll for an attack. With disadvantage because it is invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't count? I feel like it still counts, though. It's only 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Trinket slashes out in the air. With the obfuscation of the Stinking Cloud and the invisible dragon, Trinket's just getting mouthfuls of air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does Stinking Cloud do to me?

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Makes you sick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. I try to run away. I try to run around and run past Umbrasyl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not in the cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I would go through it if I tried to run between its legs. I'll just try to run along to the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the broom, still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it matter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, that will give you a little more action, you just can't attack from the broom because you'll have disadvantage on your attacks since you haven't finished your set-up yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus. I just want to run, on the broom, and use my bonus action. Is that as far as I can get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you can get on your regular feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On my broom, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And can I use my bonus action to hide? Can I try to hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are completely out in the open. You have no way of hiding right now. You be can like, "Hide! "You don't see me!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can dash and get further away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to dash and I'm going to get further away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rogue bonus action? Hide, dash, disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to hide behind those things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can get there. However, as you rush by, Umbrasyl does get an attack of opportunity on you. He's going to make a bite as you rush by. That is going to be a 30 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't it at a disadvantage since he's in smoke?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's in farts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's a d10. Sorry. You take 25 points of piercing damage. Plus an additional eight points of acid damage from the inside of its mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Tight, tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A total of 33 points of damage as you rush past. All right, that ends your turn, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The insect cloud fades away, insects just dying off and dropping to the ground in piles of currently twitching insects. However, the acid pools suddenly begin to rumble and expand and reach out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad I hid by another acid pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any creature within 20 feet of the pool has to make a strength saving throw. So that will be Shale, Grog, Pike and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have inspiration, if you want to use it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are we rolling for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A strength or a dex saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, good to know. Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. And? Five. All right, so you guys both manage to, as the pool swishes out and comes up to your knees, Grog, and you just pull back and lean against the wall. As the pool subsides back, no immediate effect. Just barely manages to catch you. However, both Shale and Vax are pulled 20 feet into the pool--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over and over again. Pulled into the actual acid pool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like adding insult to injury. You're going to die and I'm going to call you your brother the entire time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. I'm sorry about that. You both are knocked prone and pulled into the water. Because it is an acid pit, you both also suffer 12 points of acid damage. Both Shale and Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a thing that can happen. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now Umbrasyl, who failed the saving throw--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gets to spend his entire turn coughing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't believe Stinking Cloud worked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spends his entire turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature spends its action retching and reeling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope he coughs his innards out the hole in his gut. Dragon hernia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends its action. It is going to move out, see if it's-- I forgot to roll concentration for the Invisibility on the last attack that happened. I just rolled a one. With that, it appears once again on the map. The Invisibility spell no longer there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we can watch it kill us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to stomp over, out of the cloud, right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Trinket get an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, actually. Go ahead and roll for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he does! I don't know which one to roll here. They've all been betraying me. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage sustained. But good job, Trinket. All right, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's trying, man. He's out. He's so brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's doing great. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to dart out behind the pillar of stone there. And I'm going to chuck a dagger at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the far range on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60. I'm a Sharpshooter, so there's no disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's out of range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'll move closer. I mean, I know how far I can throw a dagger, so I want to get up close enough to be within range to throw a dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still can't get close enough, not with your full movement. You can move 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you? You're in the acid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am in the acid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! I'm going to go to my sister, I'm going to drag her out and I'm going to pop the one healing potion I have down her gullet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull her behind, so we're both behind that pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pull her behind the pillar. You go ahead and feed her the healing potion. That is your turn. He dragged you out of the acid pool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Potion of greater healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that is a 4d4 plus four healing to you. That ends Vax's turn. Shale, you're up.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right. I'm going to stand up if I can and make my way back onto firm rock. Do I take any damage when I start my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon is fully visible to you.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Pick on someone your own size! And I whack him on the derriere with my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You have three attacks, correct?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: The first one is a very sad 14. I'm not going to waste the d10 on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Across the hide, no damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Chris, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspiration?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a level 13 fighter, don't you get a third attack with your action?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What's that? Oh, yes, you're right. That one, I rolled a 19. I will spend the inspiration die and turn it into a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll damage with the quarterstaff.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I do 11 points of whacky-whacky damage and try to bait this thing into turning on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I will also use my second wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: To regain 15 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it spins around, that's when your staff actually hits the back of its hide. As it does, it gooses it a little, in a sensitive place, and the tail arcs strangely and slams into the stone, next to you, missing you by about six inches.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Great. I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. (sing-song) I'm going to Guiding Bolt him right up the butt! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the position for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level are you casting Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third level on Guiding Bolt. All right. That will put it at 6d6. So go ahead and roll a spell attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 6d6 and we'll double it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And double it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a critical hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've never done that before!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Right up the butt!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Monstah! Kill him!

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Kan-cho!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, 24! One more! So, 50 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the next attack has advantage against Umbrasyl.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Still alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action. You still have your movement and bonus, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I think I'm going to stay, and then bonus action, I'm going to throw up a Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where do you want your Spiritual Weapon to go? What level is Spiritual Weapon, Second level? Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. A really large meathook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Where are you setting it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right at his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Sitting right there at the tail of Umbrasyl, this giant, glowing, radiant meathook appears and makes its strike. Go ahead and make your spell attack against Umbrasyl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That hits. Go ahead and roll damage. It's a 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, all right. Going to stay where you are? Or you going to move?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stay with my Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're still piggybacking on Grog. Got it. Okay, that ends Pike's turn. Keyleth, you're up. Actually, at the end of Pike's turn--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, I'm sorry, I'm going to get off his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're staying where you are, though?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you'll be there. At the end of your turn, Umbrasyl's going to use another legendary action to make a second tail attack at Scanlan again, frustrated by this whole circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use Cutting Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may, if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could reduce the damage though, with your Cutting Words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably for the best. For that, you suffer 28 points of bludgeoning damage. As the tail swoops down, finding its mark, slamming into you, sending you against the wall of the stonework, and you stumble forward back into place, feeling already the impact of the bludgeoning wound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a four, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you reduce that to 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry-- brain!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Faerie Fire (poof) right in front of me. Right on top of him. It gives everybody advantage on attacks against him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope he's got enough hit points to make it worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage on the saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, take it, bitch! Glitter bomb! It's like a Kesha music video.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's a four plus nine because of the disadvantage. I rolled a ten and a four. That will bring it to 13. It does not succeed. You watch as a second burst of purplish energy surrounds Umbrasyl, radiating a glow.

lines.name: CHRIS

lines.text: Your armor takes it by half, so you would take 31.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 62? Okay.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Cursed lizard, we're going to give all your treasure to the poor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, it takes the rest of its action to move further back at its 80 foot flight, and it's going to end up right about there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's too big to fit in its own house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's going to end its turn. That now brings it to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The twins still have advantage because it's got the Faerie Fire on it, right? You said everyone in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you need to make a concentration check, by the way, from the damage you just took.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he get out of the darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, ouch, not good at all. What am I making, just a constitution check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your constitution modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Faerie Fire fades as the acid consumes you, no longer affected by it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, it's your turn. To answer your question, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody's near it anymore, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I would like to scrabble up behind it, as close to its treasure pile as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that would be about there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to throw. Shit. No, cancel that. I'd like to run up its tail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go rushing, clambering onto the back of its tail. It swoops around and sees you doing so, but you're already quick and on it. What are you going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action until somebody gets up on this motherfucker, and as soon as somebody gets close and catches his attention I'm going to stab into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right, that takes the end of Vax's turn. Shale, you're up.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I stride up to the dragon and smack it on the nose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Atta girl, Shale!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speed of 20 feet, you said?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about as far as you can move this turn. You can dash if you want to, but even so, you still can't quite get to it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right then. I will use all my action to get as close to it as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go. All right! Ending Shale's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I didn't realize I was up so quickly. All right.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Although, actually, I have action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, actually.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So I will then whack him on the nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yes.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right, so that's going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have 13 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 13? I thought that said 93.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I count up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, that just barely hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So I whack it for nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm above it. Do I get advantage for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, because you are behind, you are flanking it, so as we'll use the flanking rules for this, you do have advantage on the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so, good. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits. Go ahead and roll damage with sneak attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, all righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is the bonus action gone because of holding the action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah, you just get the one action to hold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Add one point to that. It was the keen dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as part of your action surge, you get two more attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not one, add eight to that. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Add seven more. Then add three.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Nope, and nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have inspiration!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I used it already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: But thank you, it was very helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're useless!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: A fickle lover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one hit, it snorts in reaction to it. As it pulls back, you swing twice more, pretty sure the head was in the same place it was going to be, but unfortunately, meet air. Curse your sight!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: He had a bit of an itch on his back, that's what it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caught the attention. All right, that brings us to Pike. What are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cast Prayer of Healing over to everybody over there. So, Keyleth, Percy, Scanlan, Shale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome. I'm into this.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm sort of right under the dragon. I'm actually quite far.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, she's gone. Who's that down there? That's you, Percy, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level is Prayer of Healing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do it at fifth level. It's a second level, but I'm going to do it at fifth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within 30 feet of you, so five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can heal my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could also run closer and do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I'll run closer. And I'll run around, not into the pool of acid death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as close as you can get right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that close?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's close enough for Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's enough for Scanlan and Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy needs it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy needs it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy's not in range.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. Can I go the other way around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can go through the acid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was only 12 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't have a lot left. All right, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do what you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Fuck. Can I stay where I was at, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Stay right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry, I'm going to not do that. I'm going to Guiding Bolt then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can just barely make out the position of where Umbrasyl is. You can go ahead and make the attack, but it's going to get cover bonus to the range.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I peek out? Can I move out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move here if you want to, and it'll help a little bit. It'll only give it a minor bonus. Go ahead and make your attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your spell attack. Is this basic level Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Basic level Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope. Doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and reach around and as it's moving its wings about, you manage to strike the stone just blocking half of its form. It splashes with energy and dissipates with no effect, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Can I tuck back in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm going to move the Spiritual Weapon with my bonus attack, or can I not do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that, yeah. 20 feet? To there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That's it. That's what I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that as far as you can move it? Spiritual Weapon can move, I believe it's 20 feet. Yeah, that's as far as you can get it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, 60 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range of the spell is 60 feet, but as a bonus action, you can move it 20 feet and repeat the attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm up? No shit. Wow. Okay. It's really far away though now, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Way more than 30 feet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is he? How far away is he from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's about 40 or 50 feet or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. You're holding your action for someone to get up close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He already did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you already did it. Yeah, I guess I'm going to dash and see if I can get to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's your movement as a water elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet. 60, you're so close. Fucking dragon wings. There you go, you're so close. We'll say you're there, that's fine. That ends your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to stride over to Bigby's Hand, and can I take out a level-- It's not level two, what do you call it? Not superior, but the middle one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Moderate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take a moderate healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's healing and then greater healing, so I imagine it would probably be greater healing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take the greater healing potion and chuck it to Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a toss while standing at Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw to catch the tossed potion at that distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't even look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I will hold my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep moving if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to stay right by Bigby's Hand. I'll hold my attack until Bigby's Hand twitches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Finishing Grog's turn, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire Grog with a little ditty that I like to call, Who Let the Grogs Out?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Who? Who who who who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who let the Grogs out?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Who? Who who who who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take it, it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can try a different one, if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will pick him up, with his blessing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And throw him at the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or, you know, send him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Bigby's Hand will move with you 60 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to go up to his head?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, yeah. He's going up top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll go ahead and use some of the platforms today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Cut his horns off!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't land on me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cut his wings off!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tear his head off!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jump off those head things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have done a lot of damage to this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Problem with leaving it to heal, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's only got 400 hit points left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's looking rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should be more like there, we'll say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Release the hounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make two reckless attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reckless?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, reckless. I'll use the inspiration die. That's a ten, so that's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! That helped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, got it. All right, second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus necrotic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. 29. I'm not used to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As Bigby's Hand lifts you up, you reach out and swing with the axe, one hit, a second hit, both streaking across the face, the second one actually cutting through one of the eyes. The eye bursts against the blade of bloodaxe, and you can see now the fluids and material that once were contained within are now spilling down the side of Umbrasyl's face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ain't you pretty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Well, okay. I didn't know that. I will try something else then. I will send-- shit. I will send my Lightning Bolt. Can I see any part of him that's not inhabited by one of my allies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say there's an arc you could probably hit, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right in the heart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. The heart region of the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him right through the heart with lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is a dexterity 21 save, so I'm pretty sure it's halved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 8d6, half damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shot through the heart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that song, I don't know what that is. I don't know that song. 24, so just 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bolt of lightning bursts through the body. All righty. That comes to the top of the round. At the end of Scanlan's turn, it's going to use a legendary action to strike down, with the tail, onto Vax behind, as you are already in that vicinity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is instead going to be a 26 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that-- oh, displacer cloak. Did you do that at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is instead a 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That does hit. I'll use Uncanny Dodge, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So what would be 18 damage, you take nine instead from the tail. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take three shots from where I'm at. First, I'm going to use my bonus action to chug down that potion I just got. What's the superior worth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a greater, yes. 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like we need to retire the dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck no! No, I love this die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You witnessed it!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a third party, it's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you and Wheaton ever touched?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and I had a really bad day afterward. Let me tell you. That didn't turn out too well. That's just 16 points of damage, and I don't think I get anything bonus for this, he has to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Eyeball saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or he's going to have disadvantage on all of his attacks for the next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that is nine plus 14, 23.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, he's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. It was worth a shot. I'm going to take another shot. Fuck it, I'm just going to go for a sharpshooter, to try and do a little bit more damage to this, and I'm going to burn another grit and get advantage on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So advantage sharpshooter. And that's a good thing, because that was terrible. And that was also terrible. So I miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, second shot. The first one (boom) slams and blasts near the ocular socket of Umbrasyl, shattering the bone, but not actually damaging the eye. The second shot manages to go through the wing, but unfortunately, the area was already damaged, and it's minimal in the effect on the dragon. Third strike?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, you know what, I'm going to go for advantage. I'm going to go for sharpshooter advantage one more time, just for shits and giggles. Jesus. Do I call it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fell to the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, yeah, I miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two other shots, unfortunately, (bang).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hide. I'm going to pull top right, and go up. I'm going up and I'm getting the fuck back there, as far back as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. End of Percy's turn, going to use another legendary action to slam with the tail once again towards you, Vax. This is going to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is in the same round, so there's no more disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. 25?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. And do I blow Uncanny Dodge now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack! The tail comes down and slams into you, putting you face-first into the stone. You can feel the blood run from your nose from the impact as the tail picks back up again. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to attack him a couple times. How about that? No advantage anymore, though, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it failed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 on the first one doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arrow just splinters across the dragon's hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That first one was way better, I should've kept it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the second one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The second one was 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, the second arrow strikes the side of Umbrasyl's face. Unfortunately, once again, the wood shaft streaks across, broken and destroyed by the impact. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I still have a bonus action, so I'm going to hide with my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, I was trying to be mindful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you really just do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to help. Failing miserably, but trying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I still have Pass Without Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Hunter's Mark got rid of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical darkness fills this entire sphere once more, encapsulating Grog, Vax, and everybody else in the area of the dragon. Vision is taken. You are all considered blind and have disadvantage on any attack rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dragon does not seem to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is it we're blinded, or we're blind where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blind where you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragon does not seem to be--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Affected by it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not affected by that, though, because I'm outside of the bubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes. Actually, let me see something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That dumb grin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a five. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Breath recharged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Umbrasyl is going to turn up towards you, Grog. The head peeks out of the darkness for a second, right before it fills your space, and it just says, "I will finish this." You hear a familiar sound of gurgling, and then (liquid spray) out another time. This is going to go for everything in that vicinity. That's going to be Keyleth, Shale, Grog, Trinket, and Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I not get cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you could go with your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I need a dexterity saving throw from all of you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blowing my last reroll. That's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a 23 save, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck no. I mean, I rolled good, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it doesn't matter.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket? Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I should do a Cutting Words, just to help a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Cutting Words, unfortunately?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably 60, 30? Is he further than that? Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to make sure. 60 feet, yeah. So that's 66 points of acid damage to Grog, Shale, halved to you, and 66 to Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is unconscious and dissolving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy is unconscious and dissolving. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're good. Hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. Because he attacked me, do I get my retaliation attack on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him, motherfucker! Kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shale, what are you at?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: This will depend on this roll. I've got Stone's Endurance, so I'm going to try to use my reaction to reduce the damage, and I reduce it by enough to keep me up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic! She's got grit! She's got perseverance!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So sexy!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm at two hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog, go for it. Not with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The reckless is for your actual attack round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one was an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so the internet doesn't yell at me. It's going to yell at me anyway, it always yells at me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe in you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 27, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This fucker's got to be close to death, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During this turn, not round, so yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a 27 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 was the hit? That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus necrotic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the fucking necrotic do it? (screaming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Held aloft by Bigby's Hand, acid sprayed in your face, two of your friends on the ground, unconscious and dissolving, in the center of the dragon's lair, Grog Strongjaw, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rear back with the bloodaxe and I swing for the hinge right where his upper and lower jaw meet, and I'd like to cleave up under his skull into his brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you lunge forward, the darkness fills you, but the feral instinct that you've grown up with is enough to know the source of that pain, the source of that acid, is also the source of victory. And as you swing wide, the jaw, still extended from the blast of acid, you push through it, as it's spraying into you, and the sheer force of your blade hits the edge of the jaw, and you push, and you hear from the back of the throat, as the acid is projected, the gurgle of horrible, shrieking pain. (groan) The stream stops as the blade goes towards the base of the skull, pushing forward and upward. You divide the actual mouth of Umbrasyl like that. The darkness (whoosh) flicks out, as you guys watch Grog descending, putting your foot now onto the front of the dragon's neck, you stand up, getting hold onto where the wound is there, still living, the one working eye flitting about wildly, you reach up and grab the edge of the nose, bring the axe up with the other hand, and slam again, and again, and as you do, the eye rolls back. The whole body begins to fall limp as it crumples backward. Vax, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I am very unconscious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You'll be okay. I've got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Okay, you dodge out of the way as the dragon plummets to the ground. (heavy impact) What was Trinket's maximum hit points?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was 60.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check something here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he was at 53 when he got hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The remaining damage. Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Night saved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head lolls around, the jaw now grossly, cartoonishly open, giving out these horrible choking sounds, as the blood and bile and acid all mingle. It tries to talk. The bubbles continue coming forward before it stumbles, the arms sprawled out, its head falls limp to the side as the eye twitches and then falls still.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I run over to Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run over to Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop my water elemental form.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I touch Percy and I cast Heal on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stand there, Shale, watching the dragon fall as Grog Strongjaw, the once runt of the Herd of Storms, slams the blade over and over again in the dragon's head, a little part of you is a little jealous, and another part proud, and a little sad that this was not the time for you to lose your life in battle against a mighty dragon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Shale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you believe it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shale jumps into acid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just walks in.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Dissolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear grunt) A lot of the fur has been singed off, and spotted flesh with acid burn, but is conscious and alive, and weak, Trinket leans forward as you're cradling his head and licks the side of your face and tucks his nose into the side of your shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were so brave in here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear grunt) You go ahead and help Percy get off the ground. You come to consciousness again and you see Pike's hand touching yours as she lifts you. Suddenly, a surge of invigoration hits your body, and you find yourself feeling a lot better than you did a few moments ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, what am I at?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 70 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's major.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heal, man. Clerics don't fuck around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I saved it just in case.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, Grog!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog! I run over to Grog and I jump up on his leg, I'm going to sit on his foot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Monstah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, monstah!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I will remove my dragon tooth necklace and pass it off to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Shale.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: You must take this. You've got many more battles left in you. This is going to serve you better than it ever served me. And just so you know, I don't know what the Herd would do, but if you ever go into battle again against other dragons, you know who to call. I'll be ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. The wielder of the magic stick of nose-whappiness. I will wear this with honor.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right. So whenever you, by the way, whenever you spend hit dice to regain hit points, you double the number of hit points restored.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the necklace?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, snap!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You what?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Double your hit points you restore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was bullshit, but it's not! Dope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You finally have some hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, if you seek another dragon to kill, you might meet us in Whitestone. We're forming an army there.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I just might.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth drops elemental form and goes over to Vax and grabs him by the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'd have to lean over for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a little boy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like kissing a child.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: He's like a little voodoo doll of Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not pygmied or anything, I'm like a doll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep it going, Keyleth. Just mug down with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe this should wait till later?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tap him on the face, and say: So glad you're not dead. And I walk away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to shake that off, and then I'm going to do a once around the entire chamber and look around for any traps I can find, especially around that pile up top, but also, I don't know that they'll be here, but see if there's anything like what we saw in Krieg's cave with the crystals in the wall. Little peeky stones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look for those, too, since dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he probably doesn't need my help. I get advantage on all dragon things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay. You guys spend the better part of the next 15 or so minutes glancing around and trying to find any sign of these strange obsidian spheres that were previously in the lair of Krieg, or Brimscythe. After coasting through the crates and barrels, gold piles, the various artifacts and trinkets and things that are strewn about this back corner, no sign of anything like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about weaponry in that pile of shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about all the stuff in that pile of shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to rage loot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of things in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was first on the pile. Are there any weapons in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are weapons. There are two glaives, polearm glaives. There appear to be a number of pieces of ornamental armor, very beautiful, made of gold and platinum, that were either used for ceremonial reasons or just adorning some sort of popular hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth walks over and pulls out her Hunk of Quall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Quall it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to Quall it up all over top of the gold, see if anything lights up with my Wi-Fi detector. Since that's what I feel like it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely enough, no. Nothing seems to glow in the vicinity of the Hunk of Quall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And no other blades?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two glaives. Pulling the list up here. Going through the whole hoard, because it is 11:20, we may pick up the actual looting element at the beginning of next session. We'll be here for a while if you want to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the sound of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to go back and get Fassbender.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Westruun. All the towns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, all the gold that we can definitely prove came from Westruun, we'll bring back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With Westruun markings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the other gold that's just sitting around, I mean, we should probably just take to help the battles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus it would be nice to give Shale some gold to take back to the Herd.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Herd? I thought the Herd's-- Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a great remnant. The Herd will live again, and with Shale's wisdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There were still a few members of the Herd still alive. A good half dozen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zanror's baby mama is still preggo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, exactly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also very lean times in Westruun. Most of this gold should go back to Westruun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we contribute any of our own gold into this pile?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's back in Westruun.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I can return with the remnants of the Herd and gather up whatever you don't take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And bring it back to Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll divvy it up later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's divvy it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we take most of the gold that came from Westruun, we're a big pack of assholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said we weren't going to! We're going to take it back to Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a tiny pack of assholes right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he still tiny? He's still tiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably another two hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only been an hour? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have, probably another 20, 30 minutes or so before it fades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need Fassbender.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, you're going to butcher this dragon, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. 100 percent. I start going to town on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because this is going to be worth a lot of fucking money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Percy, do you have any extra vials? Empty vials for blood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get some of the blood and put it in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Percy! So glad you're alive and not burning in acid. Do you have any extra vials?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Checking in your various pieces of equipment you have on you, as opposed to what you have stored elsewhere, you had a few vials. They are a little jangly when you reach for them, and you realize they've been crushed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have some empty potion bottles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hand mine over from the one I gave Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one I used as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that 16 for a 27. Nature check, yeah? 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with the recent moving in, you get the idea that this dragon's true hoard probably exists elsewhere. This was either a temporary lair, or was intended to be the new lair, and the process of transitioning hadn't quite begun. Most of the gold here seems to have been what was given to Umbrasyl by the Herd once they had taken over Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe he has to give it to Thordak in a dragon pyramid scheme.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't find any of those glyphs like there were in--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We already looked for those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the circles, I meant the transportation glyph that we beamed into his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you saw in Krieg's lair? No. You do know, from having one made by Allura within your keep before, that they take quite some time to ingrain. Dragon's only really had over a week or so. So, gathering up the materials, the remnants of that hoard, you guys descend down the mountain if you wish, or is there anything else you wish to accomplish within the actual lair?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to harvest some scales, some blood, and some teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, based on the roll you made. So we have two empty vials that you managed to acquire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus he had three in his Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I help her out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything else seems to dissolve through the glass upon contact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can put it in the Bag of Colding, and then it'll keep it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can assist with any of the cutting, because I've got the fuck-all sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hand the three vials of blood to Vex to put in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many dragon's teeth were sundered in the ravaging of Umbrasyl at Grog's furious storm of axe blade strikes. However, you do manage to harvest from the body, unscathed, 14 ancient black dragon teeth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should make some sweet necklaces. Any scales?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quite a lot of scales here, yes. It's going to take you a long time to harvest what you can off this body. A lot of the areas have been damaged from the various wounds and such. How much time do you want to spend to harvest scales?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think we should just camp here for the night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could just camp here for the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as the other dragons don't realize that we've just done this. Would I know if they would know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if it's actually safe to just hang out in this dragon's lair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what we can do, is we can make the magic mansion in that cave off to the side, in the very back of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a wonderful idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And that magic trap, we didn't set it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't sprung the magic trap, either, so that's just none the wiser.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll spend as much time then, I'll stay up as long as I can throughout the night. If I hear any disturbances I'll come back to the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll help.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Once we get to the mansion, Shale will bid the group farewell and head down to Westruun to let the rest of the Herd know what's happened, about the great triumph of the bearded king.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come down and--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm killed by an owlbear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ravaged and eaten horribly in the Bramblewood, never to be seen again!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Nobody hears the tale of the bearded king!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Forever, the Herd will just say, Grog, that asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you speak with Zanror, he looks to you and says, "Shale. You live."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you word of the mountain? The dragon?"

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I toss one of its teeth at him. He will trouble us no more. He is a bygone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Good." He takes the tooth and gives it to Worra. "Well."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It's the work of those adventurers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vox Machina, they call themselves."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: They are truly great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We--"

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Don't be so glum, you old fool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grins to himself.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: This is a day of glory. A great battle has been won.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is. But there's been a lot of cost in it, too."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: There's always cost. We will all die, it just depends on how. We died fighting a dragon, and we lived fighting a dragon. What more do you want? That's the smile I want to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm glad you're back, Shale. Your wisdom stays strong."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Well, now that Kevdak's out of the way, maybe people will listen to what I have to say for a change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been talking here. I think the Herd of Storms died in battle with the dragon. There's "not many of us left."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: But there are other herds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are. And while we lost the Rivermaw, I think maybe it's time we went and joined them."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I like that idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're damper lands. Better for raising children. Take a break from all this warring and "go back to a simple life. Will you come with us, Shale?"

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. We'll set out tomorrow. At dawn, we plan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's learned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys set up for the evening, resting your sore, bruised bodies, smelling the ruin of the black dragon as you prepare for an evening's rest, well-earned. We will close this evening's session. Well fought, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't die!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, is there a hot springs in this mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There can be whatever you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to bathe, soak. We need a good soak to get the stink off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's amazing. You imagine why he didn't mention it before, but Scanlan does indeed have a hot spring in his magnificent mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's magnificent. Guys, a big thank you and round of applause for Chris Perkins!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thanks for having me! It's a great honor to be here. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end of captions]
